name: ngx-localstorage
shortDescription:
An Angular wrapper for localstorage/sessionstorage access.
Additionally it's a simple example on how to work with Angulars DI (services, InjectionToken, etc) in combination with native APIs.
longDescription:
An Angular wrapper for localstorage/sessionstorage access.
Additionally it's a simple example on how to work with Angulars DI (services, InjectionToken, etc) in combination with native APIs.
